attributes.review: This is a terrible terrible app. When i opened it i saw a racist, sexist, homophobic, transphobic, xenophobic disgusting Cheeto puff. Then it put a virus in my phone and i had to get a new phone. The only reason it even got a star was because i had to rate it something. Don’t recommend !!!!

attributes.review: This app murdered my innocent unborn child and then proceeded to give out FREE WELFARE to a lazy unemployed family. This app used my HARD EARNED TAX PAYER MONEY to pay for some liberal snowflake to go to college. I am so utterly outraged with this app that Trump made to support FREE LOADERS and people who are ANTI FREEDOM. Unbelievable. I am so disappointed.
